message: White walls, a white floor, and a white ceiling.
Is this Toue's room? The one Noiz mentioned?
I can't help but smile. It's such a relief to see him unhurt.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I was really worried about you. Everything go okay?"
I start to approach him, but stop after only a few steps.
Noiz just stands there, watching me.
His eyes are cold, hard... robotic.
Suddenly, the space around us twists.
